text: DEVELOPING: Letter obtained @CBSNews lawyers for Paul Manafort request that BOP “immediately transfer Mr. Manafort to home confinement to serve the remainder of his sentence or, alternatively, for the duration of the on-going COVID-19 pandemic in accordance w/AG Barr directives” https://t.co/8PhGQ2wBSt
